title: Rotating Watch Face
summary: This is a stylish minimal watch face that allows you to rotate it.
description: Like to wear your watch on the inside of your wrist? Annoyed that you have to twist your arm in a funny direction to read it?Like minimalist design?Then this is the watch face for you.BETA version available here https://play.google.com/apps/testing/uk.co.rossbeazley.wear
descriptionHTML:
Like to wear your watch on the inside of your wrist?

Annoyed that you have to twist your arm in a funny direction to read it?

Like minimalist design?

Then this is the watch face for you.



BETA version available here https://play.google.com/apps/testing/uk.co.rossbeazley.wear
comments: Battery drain bug Moto 360 1st gen. with ambient display and tilt to wake turned on this watch face would keep waking the CPU and blink the display on/off severely impacting battery drain (~20% per hour) Otherwise liked it. Bug can probably be fixed.
Using This Alot Color options along with night and day colors make this a regular watch face. I'd like date options but great otherwise.
Simple & nice look! Cool & simple watch face!. If have a setting to select the font size will be great, especially the day and month.
Totally killed my battery Love the look, but had to charge my watch in the middle of the day.
I am using a Asus Zenwatch2 with Nexus 5x. I installed the application. The app says it is installed in Google Play but I don't see it in my phone. How can I use it to rotate the watch face?
It killed my battery in half day ...
recentChanges: This is the next major release of Rotating Watch Face brining a total revamp of configuration screen on Phone and Watch including the addition of these new options;
The colour of the hours can be chosen from a list of Red, Green, Blue, Cyan and Yellow.
The hours mode can be toggled between 12 and 24 hour.
This release also remembers your settings after reboot and has some performance enhancements for Android M.
